    • Method Detail

      • mergeConfigValues

        public static Map<String,Object> mergeConfigValues(org.springframework.cloud.skipper.domain.Package pkg,
                                                   org.springframework.cloud.skipper.domain.ConfigValues overrideValues)
        Merge configuration values from the Package and values passed at runtime. Values passed at runtime override those specified in the package. The ConfigValue string is assumed to be in YAML format and parsed into a Map.

        The values for dependencies of packages are also merged, which higher level packages overriding lower level packages. Only one level of dependent packages are currently supported.

        Parameters:
        pkg - The package to be installed or upgraded.
        overrideValues - Configuration values pass in at runtime, when installing or updating.
        Returns:
        The merged configuration values.

      • mergeOverrideMap

        public static Map<String,Object> mergeOverrideMap(org.springframework.cloud.skipper.domain.Package pkg,
                                                  Map<String,Object> overrideMap)
        Merge top level configuration values from the Package and the configuration values passed in at runtime.

        Parameters:
        pkg - The package being configured
        overrideMap - The runtime override values
        Returns:
        A merged map of package configuration values and runtime override values.

      • merge

        public static void merge(Map<String,Object> map1,
                         Map<String,Object> map2)
        Nested merge of maps where the values from map2 override those from map1.
        Parameters:
        map1 - The base map to merge values onto
        map2 - The map of values to override those of the first map argument.

      • mergeList

        public static List mergeList(List list1,
                             List list2)
        Merge two lists, the contents of the second list override those in the first.
        Parameters:
        list1 - The base list to merge values onto.
        list2 - The list of value that override those of the first list argument.
        Returns:
        the merged list
